Community Rules

Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with our community rules before joining!

  1. 18+ required.
  2. Discord membership required to play!
  3. Don't be an ass. We are here to have fun after all! Along those lines:
  4. Hate speech is strictly prohibited.
  5. No spam. This includes both mic & chat spam. Links are permitted, but advertisements are not.
  6. No NSFL/gore or offensive imagery.
  7. Cheats are not allowed in game. This includes bugs/exploits. Bring them to admin attention by creating a thread in #ðŸ“—help_me so we can fix it.
  8. Do not post illegal information in any shape or form. This includes leaked intelligence and state secrets.
  9. Please keep your voice chat concise! It can be hard to hear over one another in populated channels.
  10. No griefing. No exceptions.
  11. No political nonsense. Civil discussion on most topics is encouraged but we ask that members refrain from sensationalism.

Any action(s) taken will be at admin's discretion.

If you have any issues or questions, or notice a player breaking our server rules, let us know in #ðŸ“—help_me by tagging an admin, or send a staff member a DM.
